thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Crisetta MacLeod
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Crisetta MacLeod

author: Crisetta MacLeod
title: Crisetta MacLeod
text: I have been delighted with the shoes that I got from Banggood,mthey are perfect for the hot humid summer in Sydney. pretty but sturdy, they even survived being washed in the washing machine. I liked them so much I ordered two more pairs. One of these failed to arrive and Banggood resent them immediately. I've also had a canvas shoulder bag with oodles of pockets, just perfect! I love Banggood!
